title: Harukawa-san wa Kyou mo Ueteiru
original_name: 春川さんは今日も飢えている
sinopse:
Meet Natsumi Harukawa, a young office lady. During work, she is asocial and constantly looks cranky. However, the truth is that Harukawa-san is simply very hungry, and spends her time after work eating delicious foods.

(Source: MU)
